channel.title: Help web client
channel.description:
hello i hawe 508 client and wana put in my web site ... hawe jar maker ... some 1 can give me link too TUT or help explain how put web client ??? if i make jar file from all class files put my jar and client files into ftp using that code
code: <html> <body bgcolor=black> <center> <applet width=765 height=503 archive=application.jar code=client.class> <center> </body> </html>
then he is do not working ... some 1 can help me with taht ???
here is link too look .... plz help .. http://rune-help.lt/page.php?2

item.title: Help web client
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Try using a HTML web page, Although you can use PHP, HTML
might be better, if the tutorial you followed wasn’t correct, On the JAR Signer, there
Is a replica of the same code, But it is correct.

Read full topic
